titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Boxer. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works for the 110th Congress.
